title: Reconfigurable robotic fish reveals how stiffness and wave propagation shape swimming performance
desc: How can some fish, like tuna, achieve remarkable speed while others, like eels, excel in maneuverability? A research team from Peking University (PKU) has developed a novel robotic platform that sheds new light on this classic biomechanical puzzle.

title: Homebuyers are backing out of deals at the fastest pace since 2017
desc: More than 16% of signed contracts on homes in December were canceled, as consumers face continued uncertainty in the economy and rising inventory.

title: One person in critical condition after being shot in incident involving Border Patrol in Arizona
desc: A person was shot in an incident involving U.S. Border Patrol in Arizona on Tuesday, according to a Pima County Sheriff spokeswoman.

title: Nyeri Family in Agony as Son Who Works for Water Company Goes Missing for 2 Weeks
desc: Elijah Nderitu Kinyua, an employee at MAWASCO, was last seen on Friday 9/02/26 boarding a matatu to work. His sudden disappearance raises concerns.

title: Model hopeful gave up career after laser hair removal left her with burns, court hears
desc: Woman awarded €80,000 in damages following treatment that left her with scarring

title: Scientists shed new light on the brain's role in heart attack
desc: Researchers discovered a feedback loop between nerve cells, the immune system and the heart. They think it shows promise as a target for future therapies.

title: Grassroots to the Olympics: the past, present and hoped-for future of rugby in Singapore
desc: Rupert Cox, the voice of HSBC SVNS rugby on Rugbypass TV, uncovers the state of a thriving game in Singapore and the ambitions - and challenges - for the next phases in the sevens and XVs game

title: St Patrick's Athletic vying with Derry City for signature of League One ace who used to play for Shamrock Rovers
desc:
ST PAT’S are hoping to tie up the signing of Barry Cotter after landing English striker Ryan Edmondson.
Edmondson has joined the club from...

title: UH psychologist provides guidance to improve mental health of sexual violence victims
desc: A psychologist at the University of Houston is providing guidance to improve the mental health of victims of sexual violence, recognized by major health organizations as a public health crisis with serious implications on victims' physical, mental and reproductive health.

title: Grounded 2 Update: The Toxic Tangle - Available Now
desc: The Toxic Tangle update is available now, expanding Grounded 2 with a massive new Garden biome,, new creatures and gear including a new mount, the mysterious Tang effect, and much more.
